segments.text: Excuse me . Could you tell me how to get to the library ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's on Memorial Avenue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . You know where that is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I don't . I'm quite new in town .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , do you know where the post office is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't . But I do know where the shopping mall is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That won't help us . Let me see now ... Why don't you follow this street , Elm , until , you get to the second stoplight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , thank you very much , I hope I can find it .
segments.speaker: S1
